alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Macon; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 7:09AM EDT until April 01 at 7:45AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Macon County in western North Carolina... Northwestern Jackson County in western North Carolina... Southeastern Swain County in western North Carolina... * Until 745 AM EDT. * At 709 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bryson City, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Franklin, Bryson City, Cherokee, Smoky Mountains-Deep Creek, Smoky Mountains-Oconaluftee, Wesser, Burningtown, Kyle, Nantahala and Whittier. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
